channel.title: Mute help
channel.description: I was wondering if I could make a command that could turn you from (mute == 0) to (mute == 1). I don't have the time to mess around with this, I got to get back to coding my fully working defense bonuses, if you could help me out, I'd appreciate it.

item.title: Mute help
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

mute is really easy, make a boolean, and make a command that changes the players boolean from false to true when you type it, then add an if around all the talking stuff… maybe like 15-20 lines tops…

Read full topic
